system.requirements:
.Member of the Ministorum or Command +10
Apt: Fellowship, Leadership
system.descriptionText: Character makes -20 Charm or Command Test, if successful all Comrades who are in Cohesion with their Player Characters are struck instead of their Player Character unless the Attack roll was a double.

description.value: Character makes -20 Charm or Command Test, if successful all Comrades who are in Cohesion with their Player Characters are struck instead of their Player Character unless the Attack roll was a double.
